headers.value: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' res.cloudinary.com *.cloudinary.com data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' cdnjs.cloudflare.com; connect-src 'self' res.cloudinary.com *.cloudinary.com;
